page.title: 07A TYPICAL DAY FOR A CROFTER
page.content: I WOKE UP AT TEN PAST SIX IN THE MORNING,HAD A MEAL FED THE DOGS AND I WENT UP TO FEARNS TO CHECK THE SHEEP. I WALKED ALONG THE CLIFFTOPS AT HALLAIG AND I CHASED THE SHEEP UP THE HILL TO KEEP THEM AWAY FROM THE CLIFF EDGE.I CAME BACK TO FEARNS AND I FOUND A LAMB IN A DRAIN AND PUT IT BACK TO HIS MOTHER .THEN WHEN I WAS GOING HOME I STOPPED TO LOOK AT THE SHEEP IN THE CROFT AT THE PIER.I WENT HOME AND HAD SOMETHING TO EAT THEN I WENT BACK TO THE FIELD TO FEED THE SHEEP.THEN I WENT TO EYRE AND FED THE CATTLE.I CAME BACK HOME AND THEN I WENT TO THE HILL AGAIN.I FOUND A CRIPPLED LAMB AND GAVE IT PENICILLIN AND I LEFT IT IN THE FIELD.THEN I CAME BACK AND PICKED UP WILCK AND N.J FROM SCHOOL.AFTER THAT MY WIFE AND I WENT UP TO FEARNS TO LOOK FOR A SHEEP TO PUT BACK IN THE FIELD,RETURNED HOME AND FED THE DOGS.
